ej,kentj001,P,guccc901,Balls and strikes $Jeff Kent objected to the called strike two thinking it was low; he was ejected by HP umpire Chris Guccione, then had to be restrained by Manager Phil Garner, Coach Gene Lamont and  3B umpire Jeff Kellogg; Kent grabbed Kellogg by the shirt at both shoulders and later kicked and threw dirt on the plate before leaving

ej,woodk002,P,hohnb901,Intentional HBP ej,baked002,M,hohnb901,Arguing Wood's ejection $Jeff Kent hit on left arm; third batter hit by Kerry Wood who was ejected; Manager Dusty Baker argued and was ejected; Wood had just returned from five game suspension for arguing with umpire
